animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am black and white sometimes.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am sometimes yellow when I am little.
🦢 I have a wide, flat beak.

animal.question: I like to chase mice and purr. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🏠 I live in a doghouse sometimes.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat crunchy snacks.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to make funny faces.
🔊 I make a lot of noise.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I can use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I waddle and slide on the ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I like to live in very cold places.
🐧 I cannot fly, but I am a good swimmer.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and run very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse.
🌱 I eat grass on the plains of Africa.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 You can see me outside when it is raining

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot. I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I am out

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?
I am cold and white and fall from the sky in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ☃️ You can make a snowman with me
🧤 You need gloves when I'm around

weather.question: I blow the trees, and make kites fly high. What am I?
I come after the rain, and have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am an arc in the sky
🔴 I have red, yellow, and blue
☀️ You see me when the sun peeks through the rain

weather.question: Sometimes I am bright, and sometimes I am dark. I block out the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am made of water droplets
🌑 I can make it hard to see

weather.question: I am a storm with lots of rain, strong wind, and sometimes lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ☔️ You need an umbrella and raincoat

weather.question: I am very hot, and I can make the ground dry. You need lots of water when I am here. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am the opposite of cold
☀️ The sun is very strong when I am here

weather.question: I am a big ball of ice that falls from the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can be smaller or bigger than a marble.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
